website_summaries.verdict: The unlocked Sony Xperia Z5 Compact is a bit pricey, but it's the best small Android phone you can buy.
The Sony Xperia X Compact is a slimmed-down, midrange take on the new Xperia XZ smartphone.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good mobile. If you like me are fed up ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good mobile. If you like me are fed up with phablets, then try this phone. It has everything that you will require in a modern phone, but smaller. It also updates to Android 7, nougat. Has security updates to this month. Buy with confidence. Would I buy again, you bet I would.
customer_reviews.author: Graham H

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone on the Market in My Opinion
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone several months now and I am absolutely delighted with it. It's fast, easy to use and feels of good quality. The battery life is amazing and easily lasts a couple of days. No issues at all with it overheating or rebooting itself. I have had iPhones, Samsung Galaxies and other Sony phones before and this is by far and away the best. You will not be disappointed with this phone!
customer_reviews.author: Celidwen

customer_reviews.title: Older but still to the task
customer_reviews.text: Overall satisfied as I got it second hand at 90 pounds. I would have expected something better when it comes to camera. Very good performance and good sound quality. I really love that it's compact and easy to handle. I would suggest to go through the pre-installed apps and disable the ones that you wan't be using. By the way the System updates to Oreo 8.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandros

customer_reviews.title: Love my new phone
customer_reviews.text: Love my new phone! Was worried about having an android after owning an iPhone but so pleased I made the switch! Easy to use and looks the business!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The phone is very good, simular to the z3 compact just a lot lot better
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone after my Z3 Compact unfortunately came apart from overheating issues. R.I.P. It was the perfect phone for me, so naturally I went for another Sony Compact. This is basically the Z3C but with a noticeably better camera, RAM, storage size, battery life and nifty fingerprint technology and I highly recommend it if you want to upgrade. And like most prior reviews, I love being able to operate the phone using one hand, I cannot stand phablets.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Smart phones are getting larger.The Sony phone is just right to handle with ease. The other thing i really like is the long battery life.For me thats at least 2 days before a recharge. The other things i like,ease of use and the operating system.I have not used the camera yet but being a Sony i am expecting good things their.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Only average
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not as good as previous models!!! Some apps don't behave in the same way. Google MAPS keeps minimising and can't find a way to alter it!!! Wants to constantly perform system updates. Come on SONY, pull your fingers out and get back on track!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Phone so far is brilliant. A much improved Sony phone than my last ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone so far is brilliant. A much improved Sony phone than my last Sony phone. 32GB gives you a much improved space for your apps and any downloads. Battery life seems ok, helps if you turn off Wi-Fi. Overall a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Aperture

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the last sony too many ststem updates
customer_reviews.text: Still getting daily software updates and its January already, thats a bit rubbish. Had 4 software updates today alone Battery life worse than last (identical) Sony phone - must be down to fitbit shtbit software. Generally seems like a bit of a lemon or just REALLY OLD STOCK?
customer_reviews.author: stephen chilton

customer_reviews.title: 2 problems
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for two years now the audio jack is messed up and I only get sound through left headphone quietly at a specific angle. Turning on bluetooth causes my phone to crash and restart.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Compact Phone From Sony
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of use can't complain at all about this phone. Great screen. Fast for most apps, although I don't use it to play games. The battery lasts all day and some. The storage is more than enough. All round briliant
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Ask for new charger
customer_reviews.text: Good apart from when the battery gets low the phone keeps saying Bluetooth has stopped working and it's rather annoying, plus I needed to get a new charger as the one I got with the phone didn't work!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Top notch Android . V cool.
customer_reviews.text: Fits in your pocket. Easy to use. So many cool things on it that I wouldn't know where to begin.
customer_reviews.author: R Warburton

customer_reviews.title: Great compact phone
customer_reviews.text: Small but mighty phone, good photo quality, compatible and light, great while traveling and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, bought as a replacement for my Sony Xperia z3 compact. I am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Joanne Clark

customer_reviews.title: Probably the last good android phone ever made.
customer_reviews.text: Actually fits in your pocket. Battery lasts all evening. Has a headphone socket. Camera is good.
customer_reviews.author: radian

customer_reviews.title: Does the job perfect. And due to hexacore processor battery life is ...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a sub 5inch screen phone with dual front speakers and 3.5mm jack... Does the job perfect. And due to hexacore processor battery life is really good😀
customer_reviews.author: George Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: good quality small smartphone
customer_reviews.text: if you want a good quality small smart phone then this fits the bill. It has a usb c connection not a micro usb
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product and service
customer_reviews.text: Product came in immaculate condition and double quick time. Great price too. Second-Hand Phones is my first port of call for my next mobile phone purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Another phone
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered a Sony xperia x compact but i received an xperia XZ😂 btw there's no problem for me, i like it, looks like new, nice quality, just it may be a dissappointment for anyone if they receive another device X
customer_reviews.author: EternalHuntress

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Very good, brand new as described. 2 months usage and in full working order. Prompt delivery. Started up in German but could simply change language straight away so not an issue for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with the phone
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with the phone, quick processor, excellent camera, all the features you would expect on a device of this price.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Compact phone, fast, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great little phone. Still going strong. Good photos. Speed decent. Compact size best thing about it
customer_reviews.author: Richard D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery
customer_reviews.text: Excellent battery life. Otherwise very similar to previous Xperia models I've owned. East to use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Drew

customer_reviews.title: Sony Xperia X Compact
customer_reviews.text: This product is as good as the other reviews I had read - a high quality phone.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Fast, compact, brilliant camera
customer_reviews.text: Great compact phone. Still worth to buy in 2020 at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Balage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: well made good phone functionality good cam terrific battery life
customer_reviews.author: Joe Einstein

customer_reviews.title: safe site to buy from
customer_reviews.text: order was on time and was pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: SHIRLEY THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Sony great quality, Android run phone!
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good quality phone, your getting what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, it's just the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, it's just the perfect size. Bought to replace my Z3 Compact after 2 years. Like the solid construction and "ceramic" feel, however the surface picks up fingerprints easily and tiny hairline scratches that can be seen in very direct light. It's actually a very deep blue not black. Battery life isn't great, you can actually see the percentage points dropping down, but not too worried as my car charges it when Android Auto is on so it's always fully charged when I get to work/home. Latest software, easy to use, some bloat but apps easily disabled. Sony support in my experience has been top notch for warranty repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best compact phone on the market
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, got it as a replacement for Z5 Compact and I must that this model has improved in every aspect. It runs much smoother, battery life is outstanding (love the new Battery Care mode), fingerprint scanner works better. Phone is very handy and nice to use with one hand. I've heard that this might be the last premium-spec compact phone on the market, so get it while you can!
customer_reviews.author: Dmitrij Rubcov

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: for those that like Sony smart phones this is a very capable unit
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good value protects and makes the phone look quite special with the green on the black
customer_reviews.author: JAJ

customer_reviews.title: Great little phone......
customer_reviews.text: Great little phone, definitely recommend, I was looking for a small but fast phone which is really hard to find these days. There was this and the iPhone se. I chose this as I like the freedom android offers over apple, but will admit iOS is clean and just works. But if you looking for a fast phone with a good camera and feels comfortable then this ticks all the boxes. Can't believe how fast it is, especially the finger print scanner.
customer_reviews.author: M. James

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone in February 2017. It broke in August 2017. Tried to register with Sony to log a repair, but unable to. Sony are completely unable to communicate and appear uninterested in my broken phone. Avoid Sony. Amazon, however, are wonderful - they replaced the phone without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Listen to the people who have bought one...
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't leave reviews but this phone deserves some support. I've read most reviews and alot are negative. I never had a Z5 compact because of the overheating and camera performance issues. So I can't compare them but I'd reccommend yotube because theres some great comparison reviews which helped my decision. Back to this phone and its epic. The battery lasts between 1.5 days and 2 days easy. No overheating or heating issues at all. Smooth performance, camera is great, fingerprint sensor is super fast, lovely curved design, easy to use in one hand. I could go on and on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing and exhausting experience
customer_reviews.text: One major issue: The microphone on the Phone didn't work well during the calls. I have returned the phone and I'm waiting for the Item and Postage refund. Minor issue: The Phone description on the product info page mentions "Fingerprint sensor", but my unit did not have that. Overall, it has been a very disappointing, harrowing and exhausting experience for me. Can't recommend this type of shopping experience to anyone ever.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul K

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, clear, and very responsive.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant handset. Moved away from the z5 compact as I had overheating and poor battery performance. This handset is responsive, very well made, and so far battery performance is as expected. The screen is bright and very clear over the z5c. The curved edges also mean it fits better in one hand. Very happy with the change.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Phone size reasonable. General tech acceptable but not stellar. Headphones other than sony drop - not recognised after 5 mins maximum. Equally the hotspot constantly drops. One of the main reasons I bought was for hotspot so deeply upset.
customer_reviews.author: Brucey

customer_reviews.title: it's that the camera it's really bad, for example i have another phone Asus zenfone ...
customer_reviews.text: Only Con i have for this phone, it's that the camera it's really bad, for example i have another phone Asus zenfone 2 laser 13 mpx, that phone shoots better pictures than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disgusted.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely disgusted. Ordered the phone last week with prime. The phone came and works fine as I can tell, but the charger won't work AT ALL. Amazon maintain I have to contact the manufacturer and send the whole thing back as they can't send me one part.... I need a phone urgently and I am genuinely disgusted. Quick enough to take your money but are no help.
customer_reviews.author: Rhi

customer_reviews.title: Compact size and long battery life
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mobile-phone for a number of months and I'm very happy with it. The fingerprint reader is a bit irritating, in principle an excellent idea but there are times when the phone will irritatingly refuse to accept my fingerprint and I end up having to use PIN access. I do like the phone, and I could always simply opt-out of fingerprint recognition..
customer_reviews.author: L Thompson

customer_reviews.title: One to avoid
customer_reviews.text: Ok for a month and then it kept restarting in a loop. Switching it off or pressing the on and volume button simultaneously did not solve the problem. Downloaded the sony software to get the phone back to its factory settings - took quite a few hours. Didn't want to take a chance with it happening again. Returned it to Amazon and was refunded. I will be avoiding Xperia models in future. I wouldn't have given it one star but had to in order to submit the review!
customer_reviews.author: V.R. H.

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone for £125
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic phone. I have an Xperia XZ1 Compact and I have to say there is surprisingly very little difference between the Snapdragon 650 of the X Compact and the Snapdragon 835 of the XZ1 Compact. The speakers are also better on the X Compact. Punches way above its price point. Highly recommended over any other phone for the same price, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Beta Bux

customer_reviews.title: Is pretty much the same as my old phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after I damaged my Z3 compact. Is pretty much the same as my old phone. Main improvement is the fingerprint sensor. This is a welcome addition and I like the fact it is on the side of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: TiredDad

customer_reviews.title: Smallest phone that does it all.
customer_reviews.text: I went out looking for the smallest phone that does it all, and this is it, pure and simple. I especially like using it for supermarket payments; with the fingerprint sensor built in to the power button, all I have to do on pulling a cold phone out of my pocket is press and tap.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful phone. Light, compact, great memory for all apps and music/movies downloads. Fast, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Place

customer_reviews.title: wear screen protector if you want to save the phone as new for many years
customer_reviews.text: one of the best phone ever, quickly operating eve its only 3gb ram. durable and I can say its waterproof, even there is not written this future in official phone futures
customer_reviews.author: Aivaras D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent compact phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent screen making this a very usable compact phone, video and photo quality is brilliant. I use the phone as a Kindle for long periods of the day and still achieve battery life of around 2 days. Super value
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: I hate phablets.
customer_reviews.text: It's a Sony and it's compact, and while it's touted as being mid range I'll take a mid range compact over a top of the range phablet all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Dino G.

customer_reviews.title: Loving this phone
customer_reviews.text: Sony have done it again a lovely sweet little phone, battery life is as standard on all smartphones a good day with heavy use light usage you should easily get 4-5 days.
customer_reviews.author: M. Court

customer_reviews.title: Excellent photos.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mobile phone and brilliant camera. Fully charged the battery life is fine (1 to 2 days).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good phone, not as perfect and fast as the Z1 compact but still a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone - Sony need to get their bloatware off
customer_reviews.text: Lovely phone once you remove all the Sony bloatware. On 'stamina' mode the battery lasts me almost a week. (I am a fairly light user - just a few texts and emails per day.)
customer_reviews.author: chas

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Birthday gift for my mother, Amazon took great care to deliver it on time. So far it's great and looks like she loves it. (She wanted something not to big for her hands) Fingerprint sensor is built into the power button so when owner presses it the phone unlocks straight away, and if someone else does it it asks for a password or a pattern. (Fantastic feature) Great device, hope it will serve her long and well.
customer_reviews.author: #G'c

customer_reviews.title: Better than the over rated Iphone!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone for a month and absolutely love this phone. Its incredibly light and easy to use.I love that you can download lots of apps on it and there is no memory issue at all. The corners on the phone make it look so elegant. Prefer it to the shape of the Iphone. Able to move smoothly between apps. Camera quality is clear for photos and videos. Thank you for sending this so promptly and in excellent packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Lavvy

customer_reviews.title: Best phone she's had
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. She doesn't like big phones so this is perfect for her. It's well specced and very well made. The body of the phone is made from really good quality seamless plastic with the usual gorilla glass on the front. She's dropped it a couple of times and it's held up really well with no case on.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Pocock

customer_reviews.title: Great phone and worth the upgrade from earlier models
customer_reviews.text: Great phone and worth the upgrade from earlier models. However, the lack of MHL means you have to cast to TV which can be very hit and miss and blocky.
customer_reviews.author: Scooby Fizz

customer_reviews.title: ... for a couple of months now and i'm in love! I searched for a long time for one ...
customer_reviews.text: Had the phone for a couple of months now and i'm in love! I searched for a long time for one that is relatively small-sized but still good quality... Hate those big chunky cellphones they make nowadays. If you're like me then this is the answer! Works wonderfully fast, great screen, great camera, no heating issues and battery lasts a long time. Absolutely worth the money for me.
customer_reviews.author: SLG

customer_reviews.title: ... had it for nearly a year now and still love it.
customer_reviews.text: have had it for nearly a year now and still love it.
customer_reviews.author: klaus falbe-hansen

customer_reviews.title: Phone case
customer_reviews.text: White gets grubby too quick. Should of ordered black. Nice though
customer_reviews.author: cas

product_meta.title: Sony Xperia X Compact 4.6 inch Smart Phone - Universe Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Universe Black| Style Name:Xperia XSony Xperia X Compact 4.6 inch Smart Phone - Universe Black.

BOX CONTAINS
Sony Xperia X Compact 4.6 inch Smart Phone - Universe Black
